quote: The truth is Christmas evolved from the Roman holiday Saturnalia, a winter festival where men gave gifts to each other. They also would get drunk, have sex with each other and beat their wives
quote_letters: THE TRUTH IS CHRISTMAS EVOLVED FROM THE ROMAN HOLIDAY SATURNALIA A WINTER FESTIVAL WHERE MEN GAVE GIFTS TO EACH OTHER THEY ALSO WOULD GET DRUNK HAVE SEX WITH EACH OTHER AND BEAT THEIR WIVES
